metadata.title: CVE-2023-42956 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin Safari 17.2, iOS 17.2 and iPadOS 17.2, macOS Sonoma 14.2. Processing webcontent may lead to a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
